item.description:
There's a contra dance this Friday. For more info on contra dancing, one can "google" or "youtube" it. They usually charge $7 at the door. It's a fun and social atmosphere.

On street parking can usually be found on side streets. There's a parking lot on Brook St. just southeast of the intersection with Waterman St. I've heard conflicting info as to whether parking is free on the W/E's. The entrance to Alumni Hall is on the left side of the building. Bring water, you'll be thirsty. Dress in comfortable clothes and possibly hard soled shoes.
item.name: Contra Dance
